body:
The thorns embedded in this gnarled length of wood make it rather tricky for the unwary to grasp. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Blindness/deafness (1 charge)
  • Charm person (1 charge)
  • Hold person (1 charge)
  • Inflict moderate wounds (1 charge)
  • Baleful polymorph (2 charges)
  • Bestow curse (2 charges)
  • Vampiric touch (2 charges)
name: Staff of Cackling Wrath
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Cackling Wrath
